title: Ep. 978 -  Trans Radicals Make War In Kids’ Minds & Supply The Bullets
description:
The “science” promoting puberty blockers for kids turns out to be funded by the pharmaceutical companies that make the puberty blockers for kids, the libs bring COVID back, and Yale calls Michael a threat to democracy ahead of his speech there with Ted Cruz next week.

Order Andrew Klavan’s new book: The Truth and Beauty today: https://utm.io/uer2e .

The magic has left the kingdom. It’s time to build new things that we can believe in. Subscribe to The Daily Wire today with promo code BUILDTHEFUTURE for 45% off: https://utm.io/uereW
